title: VegNet Bend
description: VegNet Bend promotes education and demonstration of the healthiest lifestyle; a plant based diet for our bodies, our world, and all the creatures who share it. For your health, the animals, the planet. Additionally, as of 2014, VegNet Bend has announced the first annual Bend VegFest, a day-long celebration to promote compassionate living with plant-based foods and other animal-free products, taking place in May.
